duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate in classroom training to learn about core business functions from internal subject matter experts.
Engage in hands-on rotational assignments to gain experience in core business functions from internal subject matter experts.
Continue education through the passing of relevant industry exams, outside of work time.
Develop and execute underwriting strategies in alignment with the Sponsor Underwriting team's work and culture.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Risk Management, Insurance, Actuarial Science, Math, Statistics, Economics, Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, Business Analytics, or other related field with a GPA of 3.25 and above.
